Package index

All functions

choose_relief_colors()
Choose relief colors for hillshade based on map background color
create_memento_map()
Create a map of a race route with OSM background and elevation chart
geom_relief()
Hillshade and shaded relief functions for ggplot2
get_hillshade()
Get hillshade elevation data for a bounding box
get_osm_components()
Get OSM map components (highways, streets, water, sea) for a bounding box and location
get_page_dimensions()
Returns width and height in mm for common page sizes
get_track_stats()
Get max/min distance and elevation from multiple GPX files
memento_map_series()
Loop over multiple races and styles to create maps
parse_gpx()
Parse GPX file and extract track points
save_powerof10_to_yaml()
Save Powerof10 athlete race data to YAML

Developed by Ben Black.
